conversations.body_text: Hello, we have temporarily suspended your order. Could you please let us know the reason for your cancellation? This information is very important to us. Thank you.

Thank you for your response.  I have already received Simsonn haptics but
they were not working properly.  They are now working as desired.



J. Alex Bullard
--In Veritate Victoria

On Wed, Sep 24, 2025, 8:49 PM service@simsonn.com
Great, glad to hear that good news. If you run into any issues, feel free to reach out anytime. So you won't need this new order, right?

Correct, please cancel this order.  Thank you again!



J. Alex Bullard
--In Veritate Victoria

On Wed, Sep 24, 2025, 8:55 PM service@simsonn.com
